markdown: Lagufaeth Broodmother | quest_giver = Himuihi | xp_amount = 900 | xp_type = Normal | xp_level = 7 | xp_weights = 1;1;1;1;1 | rewardname1 = Release the lagufaeth and strike a truce | reward1 = [Baubles of the Fin](/baublesOfTheFin/) | rewardname2 = Kill the broodmother | reward2 = [Baubles of the Fin](/baublesOfTheFin/) | rewardname3 = | reward3 = | rewardname4 = | reward4 = | rewardname5 = | reward5 = | rewardname6 = | reward6 = | prev = | conc = | internalname = 00_QST_Tikawara_Lagufaeth | guid = f48f89ea-2c86-4779-ada2-26d05ac352d2 }} '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis [Himuihi](/himuihi/) worries that the lagufaeth of [Tikawara](/tikawara/) pose a grave threat to the village. She wants the broodmother dead. Himuihi wants to eliminate the lagufaeth of Tikawara. She told me the broodmother lives in a ravine on the island - killing her should scatter the rest of the creatures. ## Walkthrough * This quest is simple on the surface: Simply go to the [Hōhina Ravine](/hohinaRavine/) in the northwestern part of [Tikawara Island](/tikawaraIsland/) and wipe out the lagufaeth. Fight through two waves of lagufaeth, then you can talk to the [Lagufaeth broodmother](/lagufaethBroodmotherDeadfire/) in the northwestern corner. '''Peaceful route''' * You'll be able to talk to her and figure out that she wants you to free the lagufaeth hatchlings at [Tikawara](/tikawara/). You can agree to that in return for the tribe calling off its campaign of aggression against the village. * Regardless, return to Himuihi. To release the lagufaeth, you need 4 [Diplomacy](/diplomacy/) and [Insight](/insight/), an [orlan](/orlan/) race, or 4 [Intimidate](/intimidate/). Otherwise, you can tell her that they will leave the village alone and when she opposes it, use 4 [Survival](/survival/) or Ranger to point out that they are reclusive by nature and will likely stay away. If you succeed, she will give you the [Lagufaeth Cage Key](/lagufaethCageKey/) to release them. They will make a run for it and meet the broodmother at the beach, who will then thank you and leave [Baubles of the Fin](/baublesOfTheFin/) behind for you to collect. '''Alternate route''' * You can avoid fighting lagufaeth at the [Hōhina Ravine](/hohinaRavine/) entirely if you free the lagufaeth hatchlings before leaving the village. The lock on the door is Difficulty 3 ([Mechanics](/mechanics/) 3) and you are able to stealth next to it to avoid any reputation loss, as [Pekeho](/pekeho/) moves away to the crate. * Once the lagufaeth are free, talk to [Himuihi](/himuihi/), accept the quest, and travel to [Hōhina Ravine](/hohinaRavine/). The lagufaeth in the ravine will be non-hostile (one of the hatchlings greets you) and you will be able to walk up to the broodmother without incident. Inform her you freed the hatchlings and then you have the option to tell her to avoid the village. Either way she will award you the [Baubles of the Fin](/baublesOfTheFin/), at which point the quest completes. '''Hostile route''' * Kill the broodmother, looting the [Baubles of the Fin](/baublesOfTheFin/) from its body. Return the [Tikawara Broodmother's Head](/tikawaraBroodmothersHead/) to [Himuihi](/himuihi/) to complete the quest. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/00_Prototype/00_QST_Tikawara_Lagufaeth.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="4" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Broodmother's Fury''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | Himuihi worries that the lagufaeth of Tikawara pose a grave threat to the village.
